dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Good morning. Ako si Atty. Miguel Ramos. Kailangan po namin ng autopsy report ni Leo Mendoza para sa legal case namin.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Ah, Atty. Ramos. Para sa autopsy report, kailangan ninyo ng proper authorization. May court order ba kayo?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Wala pa po kaming court order, Dr. Leticia Salvador. Pero under Republic Act No. 6713, may karapatan kaming mag-access ng public records para sa legal proceedings.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Bakit kayo interesado sa autopsy report? May kinalaman ba kayo sa kaso?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Ako po ang defense counsel ni Erwin Tambay. Kailangan ko po yung medical findings para sa defense.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Ah, yung suspect. Sige, pero may warning ako. Yung report na ito ay confidential. Hindi mo pwedeng i-share sa media o sa public.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Understood po. Para lang sa legal proceedings. May nakita po ba kayong unusual sa autopsy?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Oo, actually. May mga inconsistencies sa official police report versus yung actual findings ko.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Ano po yung mga inconsistencies, Dr. Santos?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Una, yung time of death. Police report says 11 PM, pero based sa body temperature at rigor mortis, mas likely na 9 PM.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Pangalawa, yung cause of death. Police report says single gunshot wound, pero may evidence ng struggle. May defensive wounds sa kamay ni Leo.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Defensive wounds? Meaning nag-fight back si Leo?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Oo. May bruising sa knuckles, parang nakipag-suntukan. At may ligature marks sa wrists - parang na-restrain siya.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Pangatlo, yung gunshot wound. Hindi siya clean kill. May evidence na multiple attempts, parang hindi sanay yung shooter.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Hindi sanay? Meaning hindi pulis yung pumatay?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Hindi ko pwedeng i-conclude yun based sa autopsy lang. Pero yung pattern ng wound, hindi consistent sa police training.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: May iba pa po bang findings na hindi nasama sa official report?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Oo. May foreign DNA sa fingernails ni Leo. Hindi niya yung DNA. At may evidence ng struggle sa crime scene na hindi documented sa police report.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Actually, may nakita akong notebook sa pocket ni Leo. May mga notes about police operations, pero hindi ko alam kung related sa kaso.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Notebook? Nasaan na po yun?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Kinuha ng police evidence team. Pero may photos ako ng ilang pages bago nila kinuha. Pwede ko kayong bigyan, pero under strict confidentiality.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Salamat po, Dr. Leticia Salvador. Kailangan ko po yung autopsy report at yung photos ng notebook pages.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Sige, pero may condition. Kapag ginamit mo yan sa court, dapat ako yung mag-testify. Hindi ko pwedeng i-allow na i-misrepresent yung findings ko.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Of course po. Kailangan namin yung medical expert testimony para sa defense.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Good. Eto yung complete autopsy report at yung photos ng notebook pages. Pero remember, confidential yan. Hindi pwedeng i-leak sa media.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Understood po. Salamat sa cooperation, Dr. Leticia Salvador.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Dr. Leticia Salvador
dialogue_lines.text: Welcome. Sana makatulong yan sa pag-establish ng truth. Si Leo ay mabuting pulis. Deserve niya ng justice.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Salamat po, Dr. Leticia Salvador. May sapat na ebidensya na kami para sa korte.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Kumpleto na ang evidence natin. Autopsy report, Leo's notebook, radio logs, handwriting samples...

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Mayroon na tayong lahat ng kailangan para patunayan ang inosente ni Erwin.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Ang time of death discrepancy, defensive wounds, foreign DNA, at ang corruption evidence sa notebook ni Leo...

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Lahat ng ito ay nagpapatunay na hindi si Erwin ang pumatay kay Leo. May ibang tao.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: At ang police cover-up sa radio logs at patrol records... malinaw na may tinatago sila.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Ang katotohanan ay laging lumalabas. Ngayon, handa na tayo para sa korte.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Erwin, hindi ka nag-iisa. May ebidensya na tayo para sa katarungan mo.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Narrator
dialogue_lines.text: Sa bawat ebidensya, lumalabas ang katotohanan. Ang kaso ni Leo Mendoza ay hindi lang tungkol sa isang pagpatay, kundi sa isang sistema na kailangan ng katarungan.

choices: Under Republic Act No. 6713, may karapatan kaming mag-access ng public records.
Kailangan ko lang ng medical findings para sa defense.
responses: Sige, pero may mga conditions yung access sa medical records.
Hindi pwedeng basta-basta lang yan. May protocol tayo.

choices: Focus tayo sa time of death discrepancy.
responses: Oo, yung time discrepancy ay crucial sa alibi ng suspect.
Yung defensive wounds ay nagpapatunay na may struggle talaga.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: May sapat na akong ebidensya para patunayan ang innocence ni Leo.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: Autopsy report ni Dr. Salvador - may mga pagkakaiba sa police narrative.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: Time of death: 9:00 PM, hindi 11:00 PM tulad ng sinabi ng pulis.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: Defensive wounds sa kamay - nag-fight back si Leo, hindi suicide.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: Foreign DNA sa fingernails - may ibang tao na kasama ni Leo.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: Leo's notebook photos - may mga inconsistencies sa handwriting.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: Radio log discrepancies - may mga time gaps sa police reports.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: Handwriting inconsistencies sa barangay logbook - may mga discrepancies.

recollection_lines.speaker: Miguel
recollection_lines.text: Handa na ako para sa korte. May sapat na ebidensya para sa defense.
